class.name: com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.Specimen
class.query: select s from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.Specimen s join s.collectionProtocol cp where s.label = :label and cp.shortTitle = :cpShortTitle
select s from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.Specimen s where s.additionalLabel = :label
select s from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.Specimen s join s.collectionProtocol cp where s.additionalLabel = :label and cp.shortTitle = :cpShortTitle
select s from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.Specimen s join s.collectionProtocol cp where s.barcode = :barcode and cp.shortTitle = :cpShortTitle
select s from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.Specimen s join s.visit v join s.specimenRequirement sr where v.id = :visitId and sr.id = :srId
select s from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.Specimen s join s.visit v join s.specimenRequirement sr where v.id = :visitId and sr.code in (:srCodes)
select s from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.Specimen s join s.visit v join s.specimenRequirement sr join sr.childSpecimenRequirements csr where v.id = :visitId and csr.id = :srId
select s from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.Specimen s where s.id in (:specimenIds) and s.activityStatus = 'Active'
select s from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.Specimen s join s.visit v where v.id = :visitId and v.activityStatus = 'Active' and s.activityStatus = 'Active'
select s from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.Specimen s join s.visit v where v.name = :visitName and v.activityStatus = 'Active' and s.activityStatus = 'Active'
select sp.id from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.administrative.domain.DistributionOrderItem item join item.specimen sp join item.order o where o.status = 'EXECUTED' and sp.id in (:specimenIds)

select sp.id, max(o.executionDate), max(item.returnDate) from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.administrative.domain.DistributionOrder o join o.orderItems item join item.specimen sp where o.status = 'EXECUTED' and sp.id in (:specimenIds) group by sp.id
select count(id) from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.Specimen where label is not null group by label having count(id) > 1
select count(id) from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.Specimen where barcode is not null group by barcode having count(id) > 1

select spmn.id, site.id from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.Specimen spmn left join spmn.position as pos left join pos.container as container left join container.site as site where spmn.id in :specimenIds
class.sql-query: select s.identifier as rootId from catissue_specimen_hierarchy h inner join catissue_specimen s on s.identifier = h.ancestor_id where h.descendent_id = :specimenId and s.parent_specimen_id is null and s.activity_status != 'Disabled'
select s.identifier as spmnId, s.label as label, s.barcode as barcode from catissue_specimen s where s.activity_status = 'Disabled' and s.identifier = :specimenId
update catissue_specimen set activity_status = 'Active' where identifier = :specimenId

update catissue_specimen set activity_status = 'Active' where identifier in ( select descendent_id from catissue_specimen_hierarchy where ancestor_id = :specimenId ) and identifier in ( select identifier from catissue_specimen_aud where rev in ( select max(rev) from catissue_specimen_aud where identifier = :specimenId ) )

select p.identifier as ancestor, s.identifier as descendant from catissue_specimen p inner join catissue_specimen_hierarchy h on h.ancestor_id = p.identifier inner join catissue_specimen s on s.identifier = h.descendent_id where p.identifier in (:parentIds) and p.activity_status != 'Disabled' and s.activity_status != 'Disabled' and p.identifier != s.identifier
